Name: Demon Peak
About the game: Demon Peak is a 2D Action-Platformer inspired by old-school Metroidvanias and fighting games. Focusing on close combat and movement abilities, you explore intertwining areas for abilities, powerups and bosses to slay. Created by a group of gamedev students as a year-long project, Demon Peak features hand-painted pixel art, dozens of abilities and enemies, over a hundred rooms and a full 30-minute Soundtrack by Donovan Kirk!
Meta Title: Demon Peak: Jul 7, 2017, Kajak Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Demon Peak? Check out the release date (Jul 7, 2017), developer insights from Kajak Games, and a complete game summary.
